IVI Compliance Category:
-----------------------

IVI-C IviDCPwr Specific Instrument Driver
Class Specification version:                    3.00
IVI Generation:                                 IVI-2014
Group Capabilities Supported:

Base                                            = Supported
Measurement                                     = Supported
Trigger                                         = Supported
SoftwareTrigger                                 = Supported



Optional Features:
-----------------
Interchangeability Checking                     = True
State Caching                                   = True
Coercion Recording                              = True


Driver Identification:
---------------------

Driver Revision:                                2.112.0

Driver Vendor:                                  National Instruments

Prefix:                                         hpe363xa

Description:                                    DC Power Supply



Driver Release Information:
--------------------------

Original Release Date:                          05/17/1999

Update Release Date:                            04/15/2015



Hardware Information:
--------------------

Instrument Manufacturer:                        Keysight Technologies; Agilent Technologies; Hewlett-Packard

Supported Instrument Models:                    E3631A, E3632A, E3633A, E3634A

Supported Bus Interfaces:                       GPIB, Serial



S32-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:                    Windows XP, Windows Vista (32-bit), Windows Vista (64-bit), Windows 7 (32-bit), Windows 7 (64 -bit)
                                                Windows 8 (32-bit), Windows 8 (64-bit)

Unsupported Operation Systems:                  Windows 2000

Support Software Required:                      IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1, VISA 5.2 or later

Source Code Availability:                       Available


64-bit Software Information:
--------------------
Supported Operating Systems:                    Windows Vista (64-bit), Windows 7 (64-bit)

Support Software Required:                      IVI Compliance Package 4.6.1, VISA 5.2 or later

Source Code Availability:                       Available


Unit Testing
--------------------
Test Setup 1:
Instrument Model (Firmware Revision):           E3631A (2.1-5.0-1.0)
Bus Interface:                                  GPIB
Operating System (Service Pack):                Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness/Application Bitness:                 32-bit/32-bit
VISA Vendor and Version:                        NI-VISA 5.2.0
IVI Shared Components Version:                  2.2.1

Test Setup 2:
Instrument Model (Firmware Revision):           E3631A (2.1-5.0-1.0)
Bus Interface:                                  GPIB
Operating System (Service Pack):                Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness/Application Bitness:                 64-bit/64-bit
VISA Vendor and Version:                        NI-VISA 5.2.0
IVI Shared Components Version:                  2.2.1


Driver Installation Testing:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):                Windows XP (SP3), Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                                     32-bit, 64-bit


Driver Buildability:
--------------------
Operating System (Service Pack):                Windows XP (SP3), Windows 7 (SP1)
OS Bitness:                                     32-bit, 64-bit


Driver Test Failures:
--------------------
Known Issues:                                   None


Note:
National Instruments has evaluated and/or tested this driver to verify that it meets all applicable requirements of the IVI specifications at the time this compliance document was submitted to the IVI Foundation and agrees to abide by the dispute arbitration provisions in Section 7 of IVI-1.2: Operating Procedures, if the IVI Foundation finds this driver to be non-conformant.
